table_name.create: id bigint, union_id String, broker_id string, user_id bigint, mobile String, member_type_id bigint, broker_level bigint, before_level_id bigint, card_id String, is_deleted String, grade_time String , is_drop_level int, is_manual_change int, is_manager_member int, higher_broker_id String, binding_time String, approve_ownerflag String, create_userid bigint, create_username String, create_time String, create_time_db String, server_ip String, update_userid bigint, update_username String, update_time String, update_time_db String, company_id bigint
table_name.select: (select id , union_id , broker_id, user_id , mobile , member_type_id , member_level_id , before_level_id , card_id , is_deleted , grade_time , is_drop_level , is_manual_change , is_manager_member , higher_broker_id , binding_time , approve_owerflag , create_userid , create_username , create_time , create_time_db , server_ip , update_userid , update_username , update_time , update_time_db , company_id from user) spark_sql_user
